All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
APlusPaper
Represents an A+ paper item in the game that grants the player a score bonus upon collection.
AssetSetter
Responsible for setting and positioning items in the game world.
Bear
a Represents a Bear enemy type in the game.
Bed
Represents a bed item in the game, serving as a main reward for the player.
Character
Abstract base class for all game characters, providing common attributes and functionality.
Coffee
Represents a coffee item in the game that temporarily increases the Hero's movement speed.
CollisionChecker
Handles collision detection for various game elements.
DefaultGameTerminator
 
Direction
 
EndTile
Represents a tile that marks the end of a level in a game.
Enemy
Represents an enemy character within the game.
FailedExam
Represents the "FailedExam" enemy within the game.
FloorTile
Represents a floor tile that can be stepped on by game entities.
GamePanel
 
GameTerminator
 
Hero
Represents the hero character controlled by the player in the game.
Item
Serves as the base class for all items in the game, defining common properties and methods.
ItemType
 
Key
Manages the state of an individual key input for the game.
KeyHandler
Handles keyboard input for the game, tracking the state of specific keys.
Main
The main class that initializes and displays the game's start menu.
MainGamePanel
Manages the main game panel, rendering, and game loop.
MysteriousSmokeTile
Represents a tile that can affect the player's speed and has visibility toggles.
Node
Represents a single node in the grid for pathfinding purposes.
NotSteppableTile
Represents a tile that cannot be stepped on by game entities.
PathFinder
Provides functionality to find paths for enemies in a game environment.
PileOfBooks
Represents a pile of books item that, when collected, reduces the player's score.
Position
Represents the spatial position and movement capabilities of game entities.
Score
Defines the functionality for managing and manipulating score in the game.
ScreenSetting
 
Tile
Serves as the base class for all tiles within the game's world.
TileManager
Manages and renders tiles for the game environment based on map configurations.
UI
Manages and renders the user interface elements in the game.
UtilityTool
Provides utility functions for common operations, such as image scaling.
Vortex
Represents a vortex item that teleports the Hero to a random position and applies a score penalty.
Wall
Represents a wall obstacle within the game environment.
ZombieProfessor
Represents a "ZombieProfessor" enemy type within the game.
